page.title: 05PERKINS ENGINES 2
page.content: Perkins have a safety shoe shop,bank,supermarket,confectionist and a Travel Agents. {Perkins }have two other plants one at Fletton and one down Lincoln road.86% of all Perkins products are exported abroad. Perkins altogether own 147acres of land and 2,000,000 square feet of that is factory space.{Perkins}are quite safe for accidents because they have 4 safety officers and an ambulance for just one factory.The accident rate is about 1 accident every 100 man years, plus{Perkins}have 7 industrial nurses and a minature hospital.{Perkins}own the diesel engine part of{Rolls-Royce. {Perkins}and all the other companies owned by{Perkins}are owned by{Massey {Ferguson Holdings}which are based in {Toronto Canada.
